content.query:
USE sales_ldw;
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE gold.sp_gold_product
AS
BEGIN
    IF OBJECT_ID('gold.product') IS NOT NULL
        DROP EXTERNAL TABLE gold.product;



CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.product
    WITH
    (
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,
        LOCATION = 'gold/product',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
SELECT 
    s.[ProductKey],
    SUM(s.[OrderQuantity]) as [Total Orders],
    p.[EnglishProductName] as [ProductName],
    p.[EnglishProductCategoryName] as [CategoryName],
    p.[EnglishProductSubcategoryName] as [SubcategoryName]
FROM silver.fact_internet_sales s
LEFT JOIN silver.dim_product p
ON s.[ProductKey] = p.[ProductKey]
GROUP BY s.[ProductKey],p.[EnglishProductName],p.[EnglishProductCategoryName],p.[EnglishProductSubcategoryName];

END;

EXEC gold.sp_gold_product;
SELECT * FROM gold.product;
